spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Admin Kapp Slug
spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: The slug of the Admin Kapp. Used by other Kapps to access the Admin Kapp.

kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Icon
kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Font Awesome Icon representing this Kapp in portal pages.

kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Kapp Description
kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Description of what users do within this Kapp.
values: The Admin Console allows System Admins to configure and manage different functions of the system.

formAttributeDefinitions.name: Datastore Configuration
formAttributeDefinitions.description: DO NOT EDIT. Used by the datastore console to store configurations.

formAttributeDefinitions.name: Help Link
formAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines a url for additional help links for the console. JSON object with

formAttributeDefinitions.name: Parent Console Slug
formAttributeDefinitions.description: Set on forms of type Subconsole. Defines the parent console form of this subconsole.

categoryAttributeDefinitions.name: Parent
categoryAttributeDefinitions.description: Used by the Category Console to store the parent of this category.

categoryAttributeDefinitions.name: Sort Order
categoryAttributeDefinitions.description: Used by the Category Console to store the sort order of this category.

attributes.name: Datastore Configuration
values: [{"data":"Source","title":"Source","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"Title","title":"Title","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"Content","title":"Content","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"URL","title":"URL","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"Display Start Date","title":"Display Start Date","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"Display end Date","title":"Display end Date","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"Start Date","title":"Start Date","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false},{"data":"End Date","title":"End Date","visible":true,"searchable":true,"orderable":true,"unique":false}]

forms.name: Categories
forms.description: An advanced console for managing categories and subcategories in a hierarchical view.

forms.name: Datastore
forms.description: A Datastore is a Kinetic Request form that can be used to store data for use in other applications or forms. The data can be accessed using bridges.

forms.name: Messages
forms.description: Datastore for programmatically created messages to the user

events.name: Add Kapp Options

forms.name: Translation Entries
forms.description: Store the translation entries from the translation console.

pattern.message: Locale must be a valid locale code.

constraints.message: Key must be less than or equal to 256 characters.

pattern.message: Tombstone value must be empty or "Yes".

forms.name: Translation Events
forms.description: Stores events from the translation console used to maintain a fresh cache.

forms.name: Translation Settings
forms.description: Stores settings used by the translation console.

forms.name: Translations
forms.description: Stores translations used to localize the contest display to a user based on the user's preferred locale.

forms.name: Users
forms.description: Allows for creation and management of users and their properties and attributes.

forms.name: Management
forms.description: Allows for management of the Space, Kapps, and Forms.

forms.name: Space Management
forms.description: Allows for management of Space Attributes.

forms.name: Kapp Management
forms.description: Allows for management of Kapp Attributes.

forms.name: Form Management
forms.description: Console for managing forms within the system.

forms.name: Registered Images
forms.description: This datastore stores external image URL's that are commonly used throughout the system.

forms.name: Notifications
forms.description: Console for building and managing notifications sent out by the system.

forms.name: Notification Dates
forms.description: Store of date formats for Notifications

elements.name: Name Explanation
elements.text: The Name of the date format is the name you will be including in your message templates inside the ${"${format('DateName')}"} tag. It should likely be something human readable and short but descriptive, like ShortDatewithTime.

elements.name: Format Explanation
elements.text: The date format should be a ruby date format such as %m-%e-%y %H:%M for 03-17-16 15:19. Examples and explanation can be found at http://www.foragoodstrftime.com/

forms.name: Search History
forms.description: Form used to track Search History from within the system.
